column4: i. When I now login to my gnome desktop on ubuntu 5.10 , gaim starts and logs on automatically and a folder on my desktop pops wide open. How do I disable those two actions?
go system->preferences->sessions and see if you have stuff being autoloaded, or close the stuff, click logout and click the save my settings button
christ.. didn't you read what I told you?
then close gaim and the window, log out and click the "save settings" button
